attributes.action: Say NO to tax- free shares to give up employment rights
attributes.additional_details:
George Osborne revealed new plans today to offer workers tax - free shares to give up employment rights. By receiving this tax free shares, the employee gives up the right to sue their boss if they are mistreated or sacked unfairly.

An appalling policy, bordering with bribe and blackmail. We all need money, but we need our right, dignity and integrity more!

The Government should first of all apologise for such crass manipulation and secondly, give up any thoughts to have such a policy in place that will encourage even more discrimination , will destroy people's self esteem
